why_are_you_rejecting_this_application_d:
Good afternoon Alice,

Thank you for your recent application. Unfortunately, your application has been unsuccessful on this occasion. Usually, if your degree is not in the subject you wish to train to teach in then we would suggest a Subject Knowledge Enhancement course that can be done to support you with further subject knowledge prior to the start of the course but due to your application having been received later in the year there would be no time to ensure that this was put in place for you ready for this September.

Please don't let this put you off applying in the future though when there is more time to accommodate this process in a more beneficial fashion for yourself.
